Posts.EditableText:
I’m looking at developing a platform to bring text adventures to a new audio medium. You can think of these like listening to podcasts or audio books, but it’s interactive.

I’d really appreciate it if you’d be willing to take the time to fill in a survey and let me know what you think:

[Audio Platform Survey](https://forms.gle/pfacBSjfHAAoEJZh8)
Posts.HTML:
I’m looking at developing a platform to bring text adventures to a new audio medium. You can think of these like listening to podcasts or audio books, but it’s interactive.

I’d really appreciate it if you’d be willing to take the time to fill in a survey and let me know what you think:

Audio Platform Survey
